    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean connectToAccessPoint(java.lang.String ssid)
      connectToAccessPoint() Attempt to mitigate the damage done by captive portal detection wherein a device will not automatically reconnect to an access point that it determines has no broader internet access (can't ping a google server).
      void disable()
      disable Stop listening for wifi state changes.
      void enable()
      enable Listen for wifi state changes.

      • lookForKnownAccessPoint

        protected boolean lookForKnownAccessPoint(java.lang.String ssid,
                                          java.lang.String macAddr,
                                          java.util.List<android.net.wifi.ScanResult> scanResults)
        lookForKnownAccessPoint Looks through a list of ssid's looking for the last known ssid that we had connected to. If it finds it, reconnect. This is part of the captive portal mitigation strategy.

      • handleScanResultsAvailable

        protected boolean connectToAccessPoint(java.lang.String ssid)
        connectToAccessPoint() Attempt to mitigate the damage done by captive portal detection wherein a device will not automatically reconnect to an access point that it determines has no broader internet access (can't ping a google server).
